ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Just wondering what are currently considered to be the standard set of CPPN activation functions. I figure they are: Sigmoid Gaussian Abs Sine Although

Hi all,

Just wondering what are currently considered to be the standard set of
CPPN activation functions. I figure they are:

Sigmoid
Gaussian
Abs
Sine

Although reading through the papers I think one of them omitted
Sigmoid and Jef Clune's paper used a whole load more...

Cosine
Square
Linear
One's complement (I figure this is just a sign flip, yes?)

There may be other variations, these are just some I spotted just now.

Colin
